Entity Heavy Content


Common Entities

& ampersand
< less than
> greater than
" double quote
' apostrophe
  non-breaking space

Numeric Entities

< numeric less than
> numeric greater than
& numeric ampersand
' numeric apostrophe
" numeric quote

Hex Entities

< hex less than
> hex greater than
& hex ampersand
’ right single quote
— em dash

Typography Entities

… ellipsis
— em dash
– en dash
‘ left single quote
’ right single quote
“ left double quote
” right double quote

Math Entities

× multiplication
÷ division
± plus minus
≠ not equal

≥ greater or equal

Entities In Context

"Quoted text" with 'apostrophes'
